verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> There Are <S%G1526><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> Standing, <S%G2476><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Taste <S%G1089><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> They See <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Power. <S%G1411><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> '' After <S%G3326><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Six <S%G1803><s%> Takes With Him <S%G3880><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Brings Up <S%G399><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Mountain <S%G3735><s%> <S%G5308><s%> ' High <S%G2596><s%> Apart <S%G2398><s%> Alone. <S%G3441><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Transfigured <S%G3339><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> His Garments <S%G846><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> Shining, <S%G4744><s%> White <S%G3022><s%> Exceedingly <S%G3029><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> , Snow, <S%G5510><s%> Such As <S%G3634><s%> A Fuller <S%G1102><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Whiten. <S%G3021><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Appeared <S%G3700><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> , Moses, <S%G3475><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were <S%G2258><s%> Talking With <S%G4814><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> For Us <S%G2248><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> To Be; <S%G1511><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Us Make <S%G4160><s%> Tabernacles <S%G4633><s%> Three, <S%G5140><s%> For Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For Moses <S%G3475><s%> <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For Elijah <S%G2243><s%> <S%G1520><s%>
<S%G3756><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For He Knew Not <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> He Should Say, <S%G2980><s%> <S%G2258><s%> For They Were <S%G1063><s%> Greatly Afraid. <S%G1630><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> There Came <S%G1096><s%> A Cloud <S%G3507><s%> Overshadowing <S%G1982><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Came <S%G2064><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cloud, <S%G3507><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> My Son <S%G3450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beloved : <S%G27><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Hear Ye. <S%G191><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Suddenly <S%G1819><s%> Having Looked Around <S%G4017><s%> <S%G3765><s%> No Longer Any One <S%G3762><s%> They Saw, <S%G1492><s%> But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Alone <S%G3441><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Themselves. <S%G1438><s%>

<S%G2597><s%> And As Were Descending <S%G1161><s%> They <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain <S%G3735><s%> He Charged <S%G1291><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> To No One <S%G3367><s%> They Should Relate <S%G1334><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1492><s%> They Had Seen <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Be Risen. <S%G450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Saying <S%G3056><s%> They Kept <S%G2902><s%> Among <S%G4314><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Questioning <S%G4802><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Rising. <S%G450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> First? <S%G4412><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> First, <S%G4412><s%> Restores <S%G600><s%> All Things; <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> It Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> Of <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Many Things <S%G4183><s%> He Should Suffer <S%G3958><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Set At Nought : <S%G1847><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Elijah <S%G2243><s%> Has Come, <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Did <S%G4160><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Whatever <S%G3745><s%> , They Desired, <S%G2309><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> It Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> ' Of <S%G1909><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> He Saw <S%G1492><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Great <S%G4183><s%> Around <S%G4012><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> Discussing <S%G4802><s%> With Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> , Were Greatly Amazed, <S%G1568><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Running To Him <S%G4370><s%> Saluted <S%G782><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> He Asked <S%G1905><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Scribes, <S%G1122><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Discuss Ye <S%G4802><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> Them? <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> I Brought <S%G5342><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Dumb; <S%G216><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3699><s%> Wheresoever <S%G302><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> It Seizes <S%G2638><s%> It Dashes Down <S%G4486><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Foams, <S%G875><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gnashes <S%G5149><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3599><s%> , His Teeth, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Withering Away. <S%G3583><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Spoke <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> It <S%G846><s%> They Might Cast Out, <S%G1544><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Had Not Power. <S%G2480><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Says, <S%G3004><s%> O 5599 INJ Generation 1074 N-VSF Unbelieving! 571 A-VSF Until 2193 CONJ When 4219 PRT-I With 4314 PREP You 5209 P-2AP Shall I Be? 2071 V-FXI-1S Until 2193 CONJ When 4219 PRT-I Shall I Bear With 430 V-FDI-1S You? 5216 P-2GP Bring 5342 V-PAM-2P Him 846 P-ASM To 4314 PREP Me. 3165 P-1AS

And <S%G2532><s%> They Brought <S%G5342><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Threw Into Convulsions <S%G4682><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Fallen <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> He Rolled <S%G2947><s%> Foaming. <S%G875><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Asked <S%G1905><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> His Father, <S%G846><s%> How Long <S%G4214><s%> A Time <S%G5550><s%> Is It <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G5613><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Has Been <S%G1096><s%> With Him? <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> From Childhood. <S%G3812><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Often <S%G4178><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> It Cast <S%G906><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Waters, <S%G5204><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> It Might Destroy <S%G622><s%> Him : <S%G846><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> , Thou Art Able To Do, <S%G1410><s%> Help <S%G997><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%> Being Moved With Pity <S%G4697><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Us. <S%G2248><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou Art Able <S%G1410><s%> , To Believe, <S%G4100><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Are Possible <S%G1415><s%> To Him That <S%G3588><s%> Believes. <S%G4100><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Crying Out <S%G2896><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Little Child <S%G3813><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Tears <S%G1144><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%> I Believe, <S%G4100><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G997><s%> Help <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mine Unbelief. <S%G570><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> But Seeing <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Was Running Together <S%G1998><s%> A Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unclean, <S%G169><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> , To It, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Dumb <S%G216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Deaf, <S%G2974><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Thee 4671 P-2DS Command, 2004 V-PAI-1S Come 1831 V-2AAM-2S Out Of 1537 PREP Him, 846 P-GSM And 2532 CONJ No More 3371 ADV Mayest Thou Enter 1525 V-2AAS-2S Into 1519 PREP Him. 846 P-ASM

And <S%G2532><s%> , Having Cried Out, <S%G2896><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Thrown Into Convulsions <S%G4682><s%> , Him, <S%G846><s%> It Came Out; <S%G1831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Became <S%G1096><s%> As If <S%G5616><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Was Dead. <S%G599><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Having Taken <S%G2902><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Hand, <S%G5495><s%> Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Arose. <S%G450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1525><s%> When He Was Entered <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A House <S%G3624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> <S%G846><s%> ' Him <S%G2596><s%> Apart, <S%G2398><s%> Because Of What <S%G3754><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Were Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> It? <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Kind <S%G1085><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G1831><s%> Go Out <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Prayer <S%G4335><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fasting. <S%G3521><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> From Thence <S%G1564><s%> Having Gone Forth <S%G1831><s%> They Went <S%G3899><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Would Not <S%G2309><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Should Know It; <S%G1097><s%>

He Was Teaching <S%G1321><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Them, <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Is Delivered <S%G3860><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Will Kill <S%G615><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been Killed, <S%G615><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> He Will Arise. <S%G450><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Understood Not <S%G50><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saying, <S%G4487><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Afraid <S%G5399><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Ask. <S%G1905><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum; <S%G2584><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Being <S%G1096><s%> He Asked <S%G1905><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Among <S%G4314><s%> Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> Were Ye Discussing? <S%G1260><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Were Silent; <S%G4623><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> They Had Been Discussing <S%G1256><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way, <S%G3598><s%> Who Was <S%G5101><s%> Greater. <S%G3187><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Sitting Down <S%G2523><s%> He Called <S%G5455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve, <S%G1427><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Desires <S%G2309><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> He Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Servant. <S%G1249><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> A Little Child <S%G3813><s%> He Set <S%G2476><s%> It <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> Their Midst; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken In His Arms <S%G1723><s%> It <S%G846><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G1437><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Such <S%G5108><s%> Little Children <S%G3813><s%> Shall Receive <S%G1209><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name, <S%G3450><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Receives; <S%G1209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G1437><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Shall Receive, <S%G1209><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Receives, <S%G1209><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sent <S%G649><s%> Me. <S%G3165><s%>
